sentence.Network_en: There was a time when Liverpool players never seemed to get injured, but now they are going down like ninepins.
sentence.Network_cn: 利物浦队的队员一度似乎怎么都不会受伤，但现在一倒就倒了一片。

sentence.Network_en: Near one end of the lawn were twelve old - fashioned knights playing at ninepins.
sentence.Network_cn: 靠近草坪的一端,有十二个古代装束的武士在玩九柱戏.

sentence.Network_en: They all go down like ninepins one after the other.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们一个接一个地倒下去.

phrase.cizu_name: go down (或drop 或fall) like ninepins

jx.jx_en_mean: succumb in large numbers or without much opposition

entry.def: If you say that people or things are going down like ninepins, you mean that large numbers of them are suddenly becoming ill, collapsing, or doing very badly.

example.ex: There was a time when Liverpool players never seemed to get injured, but now they are going down like ninepins.
example.tran: 利物浦队的队员一度似乎怎么都不会受伤，但现在一倒就倒了一片。

means.word_mean: 1. bowling down an alley at a target of nine wooden pins
